Translations.Text: Ni liver Infan Israel mar. Pharaoh his trup pursued them aggressively sinfully. When dron igx reality him li dir mi kred tie ne est di escept Unu Infan Israel kred; mi est submitter
Tro late Vi ribel jam chose est transgressor
Hodiaux ni konfit your korp set vi as lecion future generaci. Unfortunately many popol est totally oblivious al our sign
Ni dot Infan de Israel pozici de honor ben them bon provisions sed ili disput when this knowledge ven them. Your Lord jugx them Tag Resurrection cxio ili disput
Vi hav any dub regarding ki revealed vi your Lord tiam pet those leg previous scripture. Ja truth ven vi your Lord Do ne est doubters
Nor shall vi join those rejected di revelations lest vi est losers
Surely those kondamn per dekret el your Lord ne kred
Ne materi ki kind da proof vi montr them (ili ne kred) gxis ili seg painful retribution
Any community kred surely rekompenc por kred! Por ekzempl, popol Jonah when ili kred ni relieved humiliating retribution ili sufer en this mond ni far them prosperous
Hav your Lord willed all popol ter kred! Vi want force popol Do igx believers
Ne anim kred escept en accordance kun di testament Li ej curse upon those rifuz kompren
dir Rigard je all sign heavens ter. All proofs all warnings neniam help popol decid disbelieve
Ili expect sort their counterparts en des preter? Dir Just wait vi mi ankaux waiting
Ni ultimately sav our messengers those kred. est our immutable legx ni sav believers
dir O popol vi hav any dub my religi mi ne worship ki vi worship DI! Mi worship DI sol; Unu terminate your viv Mi komand est believer
Mi komand Keep devoted al religi monotheism vi ne practice idol worship
Vi ne worship DI ki ne posed potenc benefit vi harm vi! Vi do vi est transgressor
Di tusx vi hardship neniom relieve gxi escept Li. Kaj when Li ben vi neni force prevent His grace Li bestows gxi whomever Li chooses His servants. Li est Forgiver Merciful
Proklam O popol truth ven vi herein your Lord Whoever direkt direkt his own bon whoever ir astray ir astray his own detriment! Mi ne est guardian over vi
Sekv ki revealed vi est pacient DI issues His judgment Li est bon jugx
R. This est scripture vers perfekt tiam elucidated Gxi ven el Sagx Cognizant
Proklam Vi ne worship DI! Mi ven vi Him warner tro bearer bon news
Vi streb your Lord's forgiveness tiam pent Him. Li testament tiam ben vi generously por predetermined period bestow His grace upon those ind gxi! Vi turn tiam mi tim por vi retribution awesome tag
Al DI est your ultimate return Li est Omnipotent
Ja ili kasx their innermost thoughts as se keep Him el kon them! En fakt, as ili kovr their vest Li kon all their sekret declarations. Li kon innermost thoughts
